#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int t,n,a[1001],i;
	long long int sum,cow,tum;
	double d,f;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		cow=sum/n;
		d=sum*1.0/n;
		if(cow==d)
		{
			tum=0;
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(a[i]<cow)
				{
					tum+=(cow-a[i])*2;
				}
				
			}
			printf("%lld\n",tum);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("-1\n");
			
		}
		
	}
}
